extraDescription: Facilitation Services to conduct a "what works"lab using the results of recent OECD-LEED multi country review in the areas of local employment creation and skills development. The contractor will use a series of ethnographic and strategic facilitation techniques to help a diverse group of 8 ESDC analysts and 8 external experts to develop program prototypes for workplace training in Canada. Deliverables will include 4-5 rigorously tested, ready- to- present program options, as well as a final report on lessons learned from the process.
